description: A container representing a single page of a NavigationView widget.

image.description: An image to be displayed in the navigation bar. Not supported on Windows.

title.description: The page title to be displayed in the navigation bar.

autoDispose.description: Defines whether this page will be automatically disposed when popped from the NavigationView, e.g. using native back navigation.

appear.description: Fired when the page is about to become visible, i.e. it has become the active page.

disappear.description: Fired when the page is no longer visible, i.e. another page has become the active page.

links.title: Simple snippet for displaying a single page
Snippet for creating a stack of pages
